Class Schedule

Class Schedule Spring 2023

Week Date Topics during class time Assignments due Important Notes
1 Jan 10 Classes start UAZ, no class this week NA UAZ starts on Wed
2 Jan 17 Introductions, surveys, creating github account, and preparing for stakeholder meeting In class surveys, In class GitHub registration First day of class for both schools, grant evaluation survey, getting to know you survey
3 Jan 24 Endangered species act lecture, meet USFWS collaborators, and stakeholder interviews HW 1 - Data science tools homework Preclass reading on USFWS and ESA; Stakeholder visit with time for informational interviews. HW 1 due.
4 Jan 31 Group assignments, R studio, github, and project management HW 2 - One page resume, summary from informational interviews, Personal course goals Assign teams, Preclass reading on consulting/project management basics. HW 2 due.
5 Feb 7 Data acquisition, cleaning, and visualization using GBIF HW 3 - GitHub Repo with ReadMe for each group Preclass reading on coding good enough practices and project management in github. HW 3 due.
6 Feb 14 Project group work. Focus species data acquisition, cleaning, and mapping HW 4 - Occurrence map Preclass reading on occurrence data wrangling. HW 4 due.
7 Feb 21 Species distribution models (SDMs) HW 5 - Natural history/taxonomy summary Preclass reading on SDMs. HW 5 due.
8 Feb 28 Future SDM in class lesson. Time to discuss deliverables and work flow as a team (time to start updating repos). In class work time for your focal species current and future SDM. HW 6 - SDMs HW 6 due Friday at midnight.
9 Mar 7 LC meets only. Focus species project group work on organizing GH repo and materials for sharing with stakeholders.
UA Spring Break
10 Mar 14 Project group work on presentation and GH repo to share with stakeholders.
Preclass reading on giving and receiving feedback
11 Mar 21 Review group progress. Give a short presentation in class on your species. Each stakeholder will be assigned to 1-2 groups and evaluate deliverables (e.g. taxonomy review, occurrence maps, SDMs) and GitHub Repo Presentation to stakeholders (GH repo and info on your sp) 2nd USFWS stakeholder visit
12 Mar 28 UA meets only, Project group work re stakeholder feedback
LC Spring Break
13 Apr 4 Group work re stakeholder feedback

14 Apr 11 Group work for final presentations

15 Apr 18 Stakeholder visit: showcasing student deliverables. Listen and evaluate student presentation and GitHub Repo Final presentation to stakeholders Final stakeholder visit
16 Apr 25 Submit final project. Reflection and evaluation. Final project submission on github, in-class reflection and survey Last day of class for both institutions, recap and survey in class. Good luck with finals!
